citations.narrative:
There is standing water and thick mud surrounding the sole source of drinking water in the outdoor enclosure housing
"Tundra", a male reindeer. The animal must walk through mud and water to access drinking water. Failure to provide
adequate drainage in animal enclosures may result in their discomfort or development of adverse medical conditions. A
suitable method shall be provided to rapidly eliminate excess water. The method of drainage shall comply with applicable
Federal, State, and local laws and regulations relating to pollution control or the protection of the environment. During the
inspection, the facility provided an additional receptacle containing drinking water on an area of dry ground in the
enclosure.
Correct by 25 November 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.127(c) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
There is standing water and thick mud surrounding the sole source of drinking water in the outdoor enclosure housing 
"Tundra", a male reindeer. The animal must walk through mud and water to access drinking water. Failure to provide 
adequate drainage in animal enclosures may result in their discomfort or development of adverse medical conditions. A 
suitable method shall be provided to rapidly eliminate excess water. The method of drainage shall comply with applicable 
Federal, State, and local laws and regulations relating to pollution control or the protection of the environment. During the 
inspection, the facility provided an additional receptacle containing drinking water on an area of dry ground in the 
enclosure. 
 
Correct by 25 November 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
